name: DbConnection for J2EE/J2SE
short_description: DbConnection is a small Java library that transparently encapsulates obtaining a java.sql.Connection-compliant instance. The connection may come from a javax.sql.DataSource, connection pool, etc. Also, prepared and executed statements are being logged.
